title: 33 Undeniably Luxurious Gifts for Women Who Appreciate the Finer Things
description: From the Kendall Jenner-approved Tory Burch perfume to fancy Prada socks.
excerpt: Looking for a special present for the women in your life? There are several luxury gifts for her at every price point. Read on for the best finds of 2024.
text: Tory Burch Sublime Eau de ParfumHere’s a magical scent that has mastered the art of mixing floral notes in a fresh way. Rose and magnolia combine with the hypnotizing smell of osmanthus at the heart of this perfume, making a universally flattering gift for anyone. And do you see that gorgeous case? There’s no need for gift wrapping with packaging that divine.KitchenAid KitchenAid® Design Series Evergreen Stand MixerIf she has dreams of getting her Nara Smith on, this limited-edition version of KitchenAid’s tried-and-true mixer will inspire her to bring all of those saved Pinterest recipes to life. In addition to the walnut bowl and Hunter green mixing stand, this special present comes with a wire whip, dough hook, and flat beater to make holiday baking easier than ever.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCoach Tabby Bag CharmWhether she’s attaching this to her keys or if she’s lucky enough to have Coach’s most-coveted bag to attach it to, this charm is proof that good things come in small packages. If gold feels like too much, this one also comes in a sophisticated silver.Chanel Chance Perfumed Hand CreamsHere’s a gift that’s both luxurious and useful. During the winter, help her skin stay hydrated with Chanel’s magical little hand creams. This set comes with three pastel-colored tubes, so she can keep one ready to go in each purse.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPrada Women's Velvet Hair Clip - BlackOut of all of the luxury hair accessories, I’d bet Prada’s offerings are the ones that she’s hoping to unwrap the most. And with the ever-increasing popularity of bows, this velvet one with the iconic triangle logo is a dream come true in any collection.EF Collection 14k Diamond & Malachite Stud EarringsGive her something that she can cherish forever—like a sparkling pair of earrings. This diamond-trimmed malachite stud is the festive party starter that’s missing in her assortment.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowAltuzarra Barnum WoolThere’s nothing as synonymous with the season as a Fair Isle sweater. Altuzarra is the brand behind the season’s most-coveted design, thanks to a luxurious blend of alpaca wool and cashmere yarn.Chanel N°5 1.7 fl. oz. Eau de Parfum Body Oil SetWhen in doubt, stick to the classics. Chanel’s signature fragrance will forever be a crowd pleaser. This set includes the perfume as well as the exquisite body oil, so she can double the fragrance’s impact and get the look (and feel) of super hydrated skin.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSaint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Bea suede tote bagIs it possible for a handbag to be trendy and classic at the same time? Yes. Case in point: this Saint Laurent tote. The timeless silhouette is something she can carry to the office or lavishly through the airport. While the brown suede material checks the trend-approved box.Flamingo Estates The Mini Garden TourWhen it comes to high-quality gifts for every woman on your list, bookmark Flamingo Estates. This set comes with a little bit of everything, from the slowly harvested olive oil to the soap created with sustainable botanicals.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSanta Maria Novella Firenze 1221 Edition Rosa Gardenia Eau De CologneWhen it comes to sophisticated scents, Santa Maria Novella tops the list. Its Firenze 1221 edition of Rosa Gardenia combines all of the intoxicating scents you’d find in a dream nursery—like gardenia, rose, fig, and jasmine.Hermès Rouge Lip Balm and Rose Kola Duo Lip Gift SetWhat could be better than an Hermès lippie? How about two? This set comes with a nourishing balm and enhancers that add a touch of color and radiant shine.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLa DoubleJ Dessert Plate Set of 6For those gracious hosts, a set of six La DoubleJ plates will bring them joy this holiday season. Each unique dish is hand-painted and trimmed in 18K gold.Prada Cotton SocksThere’s a myth that those on the naughty list get socks. And, well, being naughty isn’t so bad, especially if it gets you a pair of cozy plaid Prada socks, right?Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMiu Miu Canvas and Leather DiaryIt’s important to have a place to write down all of her goals and thoughts. Miu Miu makes the journaling process extra special with this leather-trimmed notebook.BVLGARI Serpenti Viper 18K Yellow Gold & Diamond Bangle BraceletIf you truly want to impress her, make her wrist sparkle with Bulgari’s iconic Serpenti bracelet. This one earns bonus points with the diamonds added to the ends of the cuff.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGucci Horsebit laarzenRiding boots feel more luxurious than ever, thanks to Gucci’s equestrian-inspired take. While the comfortable winter shoe looks great with jeans or leggings, the brand proved it’s worthy of special occasions, too, by sending models down the runway wearing this exact pair with dainty little gowns.Dyson Special Edition Airwrap When it comes to hair tools, nothing beats Dyson’s versatile Airwrap. This handy dryer will help her score bouncy, salon-worthy blowouts at home while simultaneously minimizing heat damage.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below111SKIN Limited Edition Repair Face & Eye Trio SetIf she’s serious about her skin care routine, this miracle set will be a great addition to her lineup. She’ll be able to minimize fine lines and brighten dull skin with the repair serum, and a combination of vitamin C and trademarked NACY2 in the eye gel will soothe and awaken tired eyes.Moncler Grenoble Après Ski BeanieMoncler’s beanies are a bestseller for good reason. Knitted from 100 percent virgin wool, the brand prioritizes high-quality fabrics, and it also dominates the winter essential category with a cozy bunch of cold-weather necessities—like this fluffy hat.Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
html:
Tory Burch Sublime Eau de Parfum

Here’s a magical scent that has mastered the art of mixing floral notes in a fresh way. Rose and magnolia combine with the hypnotizing smell of osmanthus at the heart of this perfume, making a universally flattering gift for anyone. And do you see that gorgeous case? There’s no need for gift wrapping with packaging that divine.

KitchenAid KitchenAid® Design Series Evergreen Stand Mixer

If she has dreams of getting her Nara Smith on, this limited-edition version of KitchenAid’s tried-and-true mixer will inspire her to bring all of those saved Pinterest recipes to life. In addition to the walnut bowl and Hunter green mixing stand, this special present comes with a wire whip, dough hook, and flat beater to make holiday baking easier than ever.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Coach Tabby Bag Charm

Whether she’s attaching this to her keys or if she’s lucky enough to have Coach’s most-coveted bag to attach it to, this charm is proof that good things come in small packages. If gold feels like too much, this one also comes in a sophisticated silver.

Chanel Chance Perfumed Hand Creams

Here’s a gift that’s both luxurious and useful. During the winter, help her skin stay hydrated with Chanel’s magical little hand creams. This set comes with three pastel-colored tubes, so she can keep one ready to go in each purse.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Prada Women's Velvet Hair Clip - Black

Out of all of the luxury hair accessories, I’d bet Prada’s offerings are the ones that she’s hoping to unwrap the most. And with the ever-increasing popularity of bows, this velvet one with the iconic triangle logo is a dream come true in any collection.

EF Collection 14k Diamond & Malachite Stud Earrings

Give her something that she can cherish forever—like a sparkling pair of earrings. This diamond-trimmed malachite stud is the festive party starter that’s missing in her assortment.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Altuzarra Barnum Wool

There’s nothing as synonymous with the season as a Fair Isle sweater. Altuzarra is the brand behind the season’s most-coveted design, thanks to a luxurious blend of alpaca wool and cashmere yarn.

Chanel N°5 1.7 fl. oz. Eau de Parfum Body Oil Set

When in doubt, stick to the classics. Chanel’s signature fragrance will forever be a crowd pleaser. This set includes the perfume as well as the exquisite body oil, so she can double the fragrance’s impact and get the look (and feel) of super hydrated skin.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Saint Laurent Le 5 à 7 Bea suede tote bag

Is it possible for a handbag to be trendy and classic at the same time? Yes. Case in point: this Saint Laurent tote. The timeless silhouette is something she can carry to the office or lavishly through the airport. While the brown suede material checks the trend-approved box.

Flamingo Estates The Mini Garden Tour

When it comes to high-quality gifts for every woman on your list, bookmark Flamingo Estates. This set comes with a little bit of everything, from the slowly harvested olive oil to the soap created with sustainable botanicals.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Santa Maria Novella Firenze 1221 Edition Rosa Gardenia Eau De Cologne

When it comes to sophisticated scents, Santa Maria Novella tops the list. Its Firenze 1221 edition of Rosa Gardenia combines all of the intoxicating scents you’d find in a dream nursery—like gardenia, rose, fig, and jasmine.

Hermès Rouge Lip Balm and Rose Kola Duo Lip Gift Set

What could be better than an Hermès lippie? How about two? This set comes with a nourishing balm and enhancers that add a touch of color and radiant shine.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

La DoubleJ Dessert Plate Set of 6

For those gracious hosts, a set of six La DoubleJ plates will bring them joy this holiday season. Each unique dish is hand-painted and trimmed in 18K gold.

Prada Cotton Socks

There’s a myth that those on the naughty list get socks. And, well, being naughty isn’t so bad, especially if it gets you a pair of cozy plaid Prada socks, right?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Miu Miu Canvas and Leather Diary

It’s important to have a place to write down all of her goals and thoughts. Miu Miu makes the journaling process extra special with this leather-trimmed notebook.

BVLGARI Serpenti Viper 18K Yellow Gold & Diamond Bangle Bracelet

If you truly want to impress her, make her wrist sparkle with Bulgari’s iconic Serpenti bracelet. This one earns bonus points with the diamonds added to the ends of the cuff.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Gucci Horsebit laarzen

Riding boots feel more luxurious than ever, thanks to Gucci’s equestrian-inspired take. While the comfortable winter shoe looks great with jeans or leggings, the brand proved it’s worthy of special occasions, too, by sending models down the runway wearing this exact pair with dainty little gowns.

Dyson Special Edition Airwrap

When it comes to hair tools, nothing beats Dyson’s versatile Airwrap. This handy dryer will help her score bouncy, salon-worthy blowouts at home while simultaneously minimizing heat damage.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

111SKIN Limited Edition Repair Face & Eye Trio Set

If she’s serious about her skin care routine, this miracle set will be a great addition to her lineup. She’ll be able to minimize fine lines and brighten dull skin with the repair serum, and a combination of vitamin C and trademarked NACY2 in the eye gel will soothe and awaken tired eyes.

Moncler Grenoble Après Ski Beanie

Moncler’s beanies are a bestseller for good reason. Knitted from 100 percent virgin wool, the brand prioritizes high-quality fabrics, and it also dominates the winter essential category with a cozy bunch of cold-weather necessities—like this fluffy hat.

Alexis Bennett Parker is the Commerce Content Lead at ELLE.com. In this newly created role, she oversees all shopping-related stories online, from fashion-forward trend pieces to the most coveted beauty buys on the market right now. Alexis has worked in the publishing space for 11 years, and seven of those years have been dedicated to helping shoppers make informed purchases—no buyer’s remorse here! Before joining the team at ELLE.com, she worked in the editorial departments of Vogue, Cosmopolitan, and InStyle, to name a few magazines. Not only has Alexis worked closely with several brands and tested hundreds of products over the course of her career, but she’s also won awards for her work as a shopping journalist. Namely, she was an honoree at the Pynk Magazine Gala in 2023, received the Condé Nast Commerce Content Award for Best Article by a New Hire in 2021, and was included on the Top 40 Under 40 Heir’s List in 2018.
